title: María Adrio Taracido
text: María Adrio Taracido (born 12 December, 1956 in <a href="Pontevedra">Pontevedra</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a>) is a Spanish politician, lawyer and senator. She is the senator representing <a href="Pontevedra">Pontevedra</a> under the <a href="Spanish%20Socialist%20Workers%27%20Party">Spanish Socialist Workers' Party</a>. She was elected into office 28 April, 2019 during the general elections of <a href="Spain">Spain</a>. She is a member of the Spanish senate committee on Constitutional Commission and she is the Spokesperson for the Petitions Committee in the <a href="Senate%20of%20Spain">senate</a>.
